288847/f Alex 2000/p Alex/w sunny/G !IS_: ocean/-100 -100/farmer 52 13 2 Alex 53 24 2/showFrame Alex 38/skippable/viewport 53 24 true/pause 2000/speak Alex "*吸氣*……$s"/move farmer 0 11 2/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 36/pause 500/showFrame Alex 37/pause 500/speak Alex "哦…… @。被你看見我流淚了。$s"/pause 500/showFrame Alex 36/pause 1000/showFrame 95/pause 2000/speak Alex "十二年前的今天……我母親離開了人間。$9"/pause 1000/speak Alex "我很想念她……她經常做醃蘿蔔三明治給我們當午餐……經常跟我在後院玩橄球。$9#$b#她把我照顧得很好……年輕時不懂得如何說“謝謝”。現在卻子欲養而親不待。$9"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 38/pause 1000/speak Alex "這是我保存下來的唯一信物…………她的秘密音樂盒。$s"/pause 1000/playSound openBox/showFrame Alex 35/pause 500/playMusic tinymusicbox/pause 10000/specificTemporarySprite JoshMom/pause 20000/playMusic ocean/pause 900/showFrame Alex 37/pause 900/showFrame Alex 36/pause 800/speak Alex "$q -1 null#那麼……你現在在想什麼，@？$9#$r -1 0 event_box1#活出精彩人生以報答你母親養育之恩。#$r -1 0 event_box2#你不應該沉浸在過去不放手。#$r -1 0 event_box3#要是你寂寞了，我永遠會陪伴你。#$r -1 0 event_box4#咬咬牙撐過去。人生不易，且行且珍惜。"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 36/pause 1000/speak Alex "待在這裡發呆也不算事……咱們回城鎮去吧。$9"/showFrame Alex 0/stopAnimation farmer/move Alex 0 -2 0 true/move farmer 0 -2 0 false/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 800/speak Alex "呃…… @？$9"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Alex "別告訴任何人我哭了，好嗎？$7"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 100/jump Alex/pause 1500/stopAnimation farmer/move farmer 0 -8 0 true/faceDirection Alex 0/emote Alex 16/speak Alex "嘿！$7"/move Alex 0 -8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
43/f Elliott 2500/w sunny/t 700 1300/G !: ocean/-1000 -1000/farmer 13 16 2 Elliott 13 27 1/specificTemporarySprite elliottBoat/skippable/viewport 17 26 clamp true/move farmer 0 8 2/faceDirection Elliott 0/speak Elliott "嘿，"/move farmer 0 2 2/faceDirection Elliott 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "話說……我修好了我屋子旁邊那艘舊划艇。厲害吧？"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 0/pause 500/speak Elliott "@……不知道你是否願意加入它的首航？$l"/faceDirection farmer 2/question fork1 "是否登上划艇？#是#不是"/fork NoToElliott/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap ElliottSea/playSound wateringCan/pause 1000/playSound wateringCan/playMusic 50s/warp farmer 26 20/positionOffset farmer 0 8/warp Elliott 26 20/showFrame Elliott 25/positionOffset Elliott 0 60/viewport 25 20 true/pause 5000/speak Elliott "我出的書上市一陣子了……雖然銷量不算好，但是卻獲得了專家們的好評。#$b#要不是你的支持和鼓勵，我肯定無法完成我的書。$l"/pause 1000/speak Elliott "其實，我是在開玩笑的。就算沒有你我自己也能完成這本書。$h#$b#不過我很感激你信任我……和我的夢想。還有，那個……"/pause 500/speak Elliott "呃…… @？該怎麼說呢……$8"/emote Elliott 40/speak Elliott "我們成為朋友一陣子了……但是我……我不確定自己是否還當你是朋友。$l"/emote farmer 16/speak Elliott "不是！我不是想要跟你斷絕關係的意思！$8#$b#事實上……恰恰相反。$l"/pause 1000/emote Elliott 40/pause 500/speak Elliott "讓我想想，我該怎麼說才對……？$l#$b#暈，我竟然什麼都說不出口了……"/playMusic elliottPiano/pause 2500/showFrame Elliott 35/screenFlash 1/warp Elliott 26 20/positionOffset Elliott 24 8/positionOffset farmer -20 16/faceDirection farmer 1 true/showFrame 101/specificTemporarySprite heart 26 20/playSound dwop/pause 1500/startJittering/pause 700/speak Elliott "$q -1 null#@？你在顫抖……$l#$r -1 50 event_boat1#我很開心。#$r -1 -50 event_boat2#你讓我整個人都不好了。別這樣。"/stopJittering/fork tooBold/pause 1800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Elliott "我們還是趁颳起南風前回去吧。$l^啊……你剛才的顫抖引來了緋紅魚的注意……我們得馬上離開了。$l"/pause 1400/speak Elliott "從這裡遠眺山谷……終於有一種“家”的感覺了。"/pause 4000/speak Elliott "*唉*……真是累人的一天……$l"/end
